trans-unit.source: Flying {2}{W}: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. Activate only if Glory is in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Flying {2}{W}: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. Activate only if Glory is in your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: "תהילה נﬠלמה; תהילה הייתה בכל מקום."\n—מגילת ההיווצרות והמקור
